name: Swigs Staking
description: Swigs Staking is a blockchain infrastructure provider established in 2016. We operate on over 25 blockchains with state-of-the-art machines based in Switzerland, ensuring exceptional service availability and quality. Energy efficiency is at the forefront of our operations, with equipment housed in three centers across Switzerland to maximize performance while minimizing environmental impact. Choose Swigs Staking for a secure, sustainable, and efficient staking solution.
